history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. apply not_lt. intro H3. qsimpl time: 1 use: not_ge. qsimpl time: 1 use: mult_gt_compat_rev_l2,not_ge. qsimpl time: 1 use: mult_gt_compat_rev_l2,not_ge,mult_lt_compat_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: mult_gt_compat_rev_l2,le_lt_trans,not_ge,mult_lt_compat_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_lt_trans,lt_le_trans,mult_gt_compat_rev_l2,not_ge,mult_lt_compat_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_lt_trans,lt_le_trans,mult_lt_compat_l,mult_gt_compat_rev_l2,not_ge,mult_lt_compat_r. srun best use: le_not_lt, Nat.neq_0_lt_0, mult_S_le_reg_l unfold: ge inv: nat.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, ~ n >= m -> n < m" on hypothesis of type "n < m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "p * ?n > p * ?m -> ?n > ?m" on hypothesis of type "n < m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply mult_lt_compat_r with (n := n) in H3; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable p.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.le_lt_trans with (m := p * m) in H1; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p" on hypothesis of type "p * n >= p * m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.lt_le_trans with (m := p * n) in H3; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p" on hypothesis of type "n < m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable p.

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply not_lt. intro H3. apply not_ge in H3. apply (mult_gt_compat_rev_l2 _ _ p) in H3. apply mult_lt_compat_r with (n := n) in H3; auto. apply Nat.le_lt_trans with (m := p * m) in H1; auto. apply Nat.lt_le_trans with (m := p * n) in H3; auto. apply Mult.mult_lt_compat_l in H3; auto.
